turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu sıkıcı işi istemesen, hiç kimse seni zorlayamaz.
english_example_sentence: If you were not to want this boring job, no one could force you.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не захотел эту скучную работу, никто не смог бы тебя заставить.
